mutants.original_line: return [f'{i:,}' for i in range(start, end+step, step)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [f'{i:,}' for i in range(start, end - step, step)]

mutants.original_line: return [f'{i:,}' for i in range(start, end+step, step)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [f'{i:,}' for i in range(start, end * step, step)]

mutants.original_line: return [f'{i:,}' for i in range(start, end+step, step)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [f'{i:}' for i in range(start, end + step, step)]
